description: 1-hour written examination with multiple choice and short answer questions covering Weeks 1-3 'Mammalian Cells' lecture series. Tests understanding of cell processes and scientific communication.

Two 1-hour online tests (Week 5 and Week 10) assessing experimental design, data analysis, lab techniques, and troubleshooting from practical content. Includes multiple choice and short answer questions.

Group science communication project (e.g., video/poster) analyzing a research article relevant to course topics. Includes peer review component. Submitted as a 10-minute recorded presentation with a Week 5 checkpoint.

2-hour comprehensive exam during exam period covering all lecture content (excluding mid-term material). Includes multiple choice, short answer, and essay questions on cell biology concepts and applications.
